name: The Infected Truth
description:
Description: The game is a 2D RPG side-scrolling platformer about saving the world from the pandemic by defeating monsters and completing all stages obtaining the cure for all.

Storyline: You just woke up in a coma in 2021 but the world you have woken up to consists of the infected including your family. It is now up to you to save the world.

Features:

  • Map (10 stages)
  • Stats upgrade
  • Upgrade weapon (Ethanol > Lysol)
  • Each level has unique personalities.

Gameplay:

The player must go through 8 levels, each one has its own monsters. You can level up throughout your world by completing quests and killing monsters along the way. When you die, you will go back to your last checkpoint.
